findings.lower_chest: Mild dependent atelectasis bilaterally; no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion.

abdomen.hepatobiliary: Liver demonstrates homogenous attenuation with no focal lesions or biliary dilatation; gallbladder normal.
abdomen.pancreas: Normal attenuation throughout; no focal lesions or ductal dilatation.
abdomen.spleen: Normal size and attenuation; no focal lesions.
abdomen.urinary: Normal symmetrical kidneys with no suspicious lesions; 3 mm left upper pole hypodensity not characterized.
abdomen.gastrointestinal: Mild pericolonic fat stranding at the junction of distal descending and proximal sigmoid colon concerning for acute diverticulitis; severe diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon; circumferential wall thickening likely due to muscular hypertrophy.
abdomen.pelvis: Mild free fluid in the pelvis.
abdomen.reproductive_organs: Normal sized uterus; no adnexal abnormalities.
abdomen.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm or atherosclerotic disease.
abdomen.bones_and_soft_tissues: No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture; small umbilical hernia containing fat.
